nodes.text: The Antakaria system was a star system that was located within the Bothan sector, a part of the galactic regions known as the Mid Rim and the Slice. It was the origin point of the Antakarian Fire Dancer beverage.
The Antakaria system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square R-14.
